dublin_core.dcvalue: Using the Web Service technology the paper puts forward a solution of remote communication between PACS and the handheld mobile intelligent devices the characteristics of the solution are simple easy to implement short development cycle high practicability and low cost etc
Zhongguo yi liao qi xie za zhi = Chinese journal of medical instrumentation
[Solution of PACS to communicate with the handheld mobile intelligent equipment based on web service].
